segments.text: I notice the woman is just standing there, drying that plate like nothing else matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, water pouring out and making a big puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see her foot is in the water, but she doesn't even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she must be really tired or something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being really sneaky, taking cookies without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy on the stool, trying to reach the cookie jar, he's going to fall!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is waiting below, hoping to get a cookie too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the stool is really unstable, it's a wonder it hasn't tipped over already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water on the floor is making everything slippery and dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this whole scene is just a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the garden outside, so calm and tidy, it's like a different world out there.
segments.speaker: PAR
